restaurant_options.name: Brett's Waterway Cafe
restaurant_options.description: Waterfront dining with marina views, fresh catch daily. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Steaks, chicken, burgers available
restaurant_options.tips: Amazing sunset views. Has steaks, chicken, and burgers for non-seafood eaters!

restaurant_options.name: Salty Pelican Bar & Grill
restaurant_options.description: Heart of downtown waterfront, blackened grouper tacos, fresh oysters, fried tuna. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, steaks
restaurant_options.tips: Best place to catch sunset over the river. Full bar & grill menu with chicken, burgers, steaks!

restaurant_options.name: Down Under
restaurant_options.description: Under the bridge to Amelia Island, oysters, crab dip, shrimp, fresh fish with waterfront view. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken wings, steaks
restaurant_options.tips: Casual vibe with burgers, wings, and chicken tenders for non-seafood eaters

restaurant_options.name: Sandbar
restaurant_options.description: Directly on Main Beach with Atlantic Ocean views, coastal cuisine, 1200+ whiskey selections. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Steaks, chicken, burgers, pasta
restaurant_options.tips: Unobstructed beach views, live music on weekends. Great steaks and chicken options!

restaurant_options.name: Beach Diner
restaurant_options.description: Family owned unique breakfast & lunch, Chocolate Chip Pancakes, Shrimp & Crab Omelette, Fish & Grits
restaurant_options.tips: Popular local spot, expect a wait on weekends

restaurant_options.name: Dune Bar
restaurant_options.description: Beach bar with tropical drinks, frozen cocktails, and light bites

restaurant_options.name: Lobby Bar
restaurant_options.description: Classic lounge with craft cocktails, wine, and small plates. MUST TRY: Smoked Old Fashioneds, charcuterie board, sushi
restaurant_options.tips: Open 3pm-12am Mon-Thu, 3pm-1am Fri-Sat. Boss recommendation: 'Wonderful charcuterie at the bar, most wonderful smoked Old Fashioneds, sushi in the lobby!'

restaurant_options.name: Salt Life Food Shack
restaurant_options.description: Oceanfront casual dining with amazing views and fresh seafood. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, wings
restaurant_options.tips: Perfect for lunch, great outdoor seating. Has burgers and chicken for non-seafood eaters!

restaurant_options.name: Timoti's Seafood Shak
restaurant_options.description: SARAH'S RECOMMENDATION for lunch! Family-friendly wild-caught seafood, fresh fried shrimp, poke bowls, fish tacos, lobster rolls. ⚠️ LIMITED NON-SEAFOOD: Chicken tenders available
restaurant_options.tips: Sarah says: 'You must go to Timotees for lunch one day!' Mostly seafood but has chicken tenders

restaurant_options.name: Tortuga Jacks
restaurant_options.description: Baja Mexican upstairs at Sliders, oceanfront sunrise breakfast, only non-resort beachfront breakfast
restaurant_options.tips: Sunrise breakfast to watch dawn over ocean

restaurant_options.name: Amelia Island Coffee
restaurant_options.description: Beloved coffee shop since 1995 in 140-year-old brick building, locally roasted coffee from Yulee, pastries, breakfast sandwiches
restaurant_options.tips: Historic downtown location at 207 Centre St, great atmosphere

restaurant_options.name: Aloha Bagel and Deli
restaurant_options.description: Bright cheerful bagel shop with delicious bagels, sandwiches, salads, sweets, party platters. Breakfast served all day
restaurant_options.tips: Open till 2pm, breakfast all day, very popular
